meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unable to be distinguished from something else.
meanings.sent1: The indistinguishabilities between the twins made it hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent2: The indistinguishabilities in the camouflage pattern made it blend perfectly with the surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The detective's frustration grew as the indistinguishabilities of the suspects made it impossible to identify the culprit.
meanings.sent4: The indistinguishabilities of the two paintings left the art critics puzzled, unable to determine the original.
meanings.sent5: The indistinguishabilities of the flavors in the taste test made it challenging to pick the best one.

meanings.definition: The inability to perceive or recognize differences between two or more things.
meanings.sent1: His indistinguishabilities in color made it difficult for him to match his clothes.
meanings.sent2: The indistinguishabilities in the identical twins confused even their closest friends.
meanings.sent3: The indistinguishabilities in the magic show left the audience in awe, unable to figure out the tricks.
meanings.sent4: The indistinguishabilities in the music tracks made it hard for the DJ to create a seamless mix.
meanings.sent5: The indistinguishabilities in the fingerprints baffled the forensic experts, leading to a dead end in the investigation.
